input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP Aerate Team Bib Evo Cargo'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Brevet Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Women's Core Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Equipe R Bib Shorts S11 Secret Blue Large'
  - Name='Endura Sultrac Humvee 8in Short Men's'
  - Name='Sportful Classic Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's P.R.O. Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Free Aero RC Classic Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Classic Flyweight Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Limited Men's Pro Team Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Winter Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Trail Lightweight Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Team Sky Training Bib Shorts'
  - Name='ASSOS - MILLE GT Bib Shorts C2 BlackSeries XS'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTO Bib Shorts C2 blackSeries'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Tights with Pad'
  - Name='Endura Men's Cycling Bib Tights'
  - Name='Endura Men's Loop Waist Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Endura Men's Hummvee Mountain Bike Baggy Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='1A Endurance Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Free Aero Race S Bib Shorts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Aerate Team Bib Evo Cargo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a bib shorts product similar to the reference, likely offering performance cycling features; the 'Cargo' might add some additional storage but core function and construction are similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Brevet Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's bib shorts from a known cycling brand focusing on performance, likely comparable materials and intended for long rides like the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Women's Core Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a bib shorts product with similar function and construction but designed for women, so some fit differences; still relevant for comparison.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe R Bib Shorts S11 Secret Blue Large
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end performance cycling bib shorts similar in purpose, construction, and use to the reference product; very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Sultrac Humvee 8in Short Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are 8-inch shorts (not bibs), likely freeride or mountain bike style, less relevant since no bib construction and different intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Classic Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic style bib shorts intended for cycling; relevant in function and silhouette though possibly less advanced than reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance bib shorts from a top cycling brand; very similar category and purpose to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts (not bib) designed for aero performance; related but lack bib straps and some different construction aspects.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's bib shorts designed for lightness and performance, close in design and purpose to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance men's bib shorts designed for racing, very relevant and similar to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance men's bib shorts designed for racing, very relevant and similar to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Limited edition high-performance bib shorts; nearly identical use case and construction to the Pro Delta Bib Shorts.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Core shorts likely without bib straps, less relevant due to lack of bib construction but still cycling shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Repeating this high-performance men's bib shorts product, very relevant to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Repeating this high-performance men's bib shorts product, very relevant to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Winter bib shorts variant designed for colder conditions, similar construction with added insulation; relevant but slightly different use case.
